post.text: WOW! Join me in Daytona Beach, Florida for a few minutes - with the #TrumpTrain! WE will MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Remy
comment.text: When is someone going to do something about OUR $400,000 Million that was sent to Iran. Why is Odumba able to commit TREASON and get away with it.

replies.author: Sierra
replies.text: I just landed in D.C and I saw all the news that republicans are in panic .. What is gong on ???
